title: Tina Brown: "The Palace Papers"
description: Michael welcomes Tina Brown, former editor-in-chief of Vanity Fair & The New Yorker and founder of The Daily Beast, with her book "The Palace Papers: Inside the House of Windsor--the Truth and the Turmoil." Original air date 20 May 2022. The book was published on 26 April 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tina Brown, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
